name.ja: <ruby>狂<rt>きょう</rt></ruby><ruby>惑<rt>わく</rt></ruby>の<ruby>落<rt>お</rt></ruby>とし<ruby>穴<rt>あな</rt></ruby>

text.en: If your opponent Special Summoned a monster this turn: Target 1 monster they control with 2000 or more ATK; destroy it, then, if you have a "Hole" Normal Trap in your GY, you can banish 1 monster from your opponent's GY. You can only activate 1 "Delusion Trap Hole" per turn.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Forest of the Traptrix
